title: Awesome Alex's Big Book of Spanish Puzzles for Kids - Volume 3 (Languages with Awesome Alex)
description: Be awesome, like Alex, and learn a language!Awesome Alex does many awesome things, like running real fast in a hamster ball or climbing all the way to the highest tower of the hamster house... but the most awesome of them all is speaking many languages! Why, Alex is even learning Spanish right now, too!Would you like to learn Spanish with Alex? If you do, you just need to open the pages to this book, and you can find Alex working hard at the puzzles and games you'll find in it. Even an Awesome Hamster cannot do everything alone--how about lending Alex a hand?The book contains 96 puzzles with 8 different categories and includes solutions and a dictionary. The categories for this book Animals, Colours, Family, Food, Fun, House, Numbers.
author: Siskia Lagomarsino
